General.Name: Kunshan Top A Intelligent Equipment
General.Description: Kunshan TopA Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of intelligent equipment and digital factory system in China and internationally. The company's product portfolio include machine vision alignment and detection; high-speed conveying and precise positioning; intelligent feeding, intelligent control and informatization; and digitalization and other technologies. In addition, it offers transportation and consumer electronics solutions. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kunshan, China.

1.Name: Ms. Lihua  Zhu
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Board Sec. & Director
